name: The Hopeful Tree
description: The tree of Hope is dying. The Hope of the world is fading away, and the negativity is killing nature. Kibonoki and Shinko go together through a journey to save the tree, with Shinko’s hope to restore its original beauty. But in their journey, they meet 3 humans. One is Starved, One Is Lonely, One is Grieving. You have the choice.  Will you save them, and give them hope?  Will you ignore them to reach your goal in time?
